validationRules.block_id: Required. Unique identifier for tabs block.
validationRules.tabLayout: Values: 'horizontal' (default), 'vertical'. Layout orientation of tab navigation.
validationRules.navPosition: Values: 'top' (horizontal), 'bottom' (horizontal), 'left' (vertical), 'right' (vertical). Position of tab navigation relative to content.
validationRules.activeTab: String number of active tab index. '1' = first tab, '2' = second, etc. Default: '1'.
validationRules.swiperEffect: Boolean. Enable swipe/slide animation when switching tabs. Default: false.
validationRules.tablistRepeater: Required array. Minimum 2 items. Each tab needs tabTitle and either tabDescription or contentType: 'template' with blockTemp.
validationRules.tablistRepeater[].contentType: Values: 'content' (default, uses tabDescription), 'template' (uses blockTemp for reusable blocks).
validationRules.tablistRepeater[].tabDescription: Required when contentType: 'content'. Tab content HTML.
validationRules.tablistRepeater[].innerIcon: Boolean. Show icon before tab title.
validationRules.tablistRepeater[].innericonName: FontAwesome class when innerIcon: true (e.g., 'fas fa-home').
validationRules.tablistRepeater[].outerIcon: Boolean. Show separator icon after tab title (between tabs).
validationRules.vernavWidth: Responsive object. Width of vertical navigation sidebar (only when tabLayout: 'vertical'). Recommended: 200-300px.
validationRules.fullwidthIcon: Boolean. Stack icon above title (vertical) instead of beside (horizontal). Default: false.
validationRules.hideToggle: Responsive object. Hide tabs on breakpoints, show as mobile accordion instead. {md: false, sm: true, xs: true}.

warnings: CRITICAL: Never modify block_id - causes tabs to break.
activeTab uses string numbers ('1', '2', '3'), not integers (1, 2, 3).
onhoverTab: 'hover' does NOT work on mobile - always falls back to click on touch screens.
navPosition must match tabLayout: 'top'/'bottom' for horizontal, 'left'/'right' for vertical.
innerIcon: true requires innericonName to be set, otherwise no icon appears.
swiperEffect requires content to exist in all tabs (empty tabs break swiper).
Minimum 2 tabs required - single tab makes no sense for navigation.
Very large tablistRepeater (20+ tabs) creates UX issues - consider alternative navigation.
fullwidthIcon: true changes icon spacing from horizontal to vertical.
hideToggle transforms tabs into accordion on specified breakpoints - test mobile carefully.
commonMistakes: Setting activeTab to number (1, 2) instead of string ('1', '2')
Using vertical navPosition ('left'/'right') with horizontal tabLayout (or vice versa)
Forgetting to set innericonName when innerIcon: true (icon doesn't appear)
Using onhoverTab: 'hover' without testing on mobile (poor UX on touch)
Setting very wide vernavWidth on mobile breakpoints (breaks layout)
Not providing tabDescription when contentType: 'content' (empty tab)
Mixing content types in tablistRepeater (some 'content', some 'template' - confusing)
Using swiperEffect with very different content heights (animation looks broken)
Not setting openTypography: 1 before customizing titleTypo
Forgetting that fullwidthIcon changes layout significantly (icon stacks above text)
bestPractices: Tab count: 3-7 tabs optimal for horizontal, 5-10 for vertical navigation
Tab titles: 1-3 words for comfortable reading and mobile display
Icon size: 16-24px for horizontal tabs, 20-32px for full-width icon layout
vernavWidth: 200-300px for vertical tabs, narrower on tablet/mobile
Use activeTab to highlight most important/frequently accessed tab
Use onhoverTab: 'hover' only for desktop-only experiences
Enable swiperEffect for image-heavy or media-rich tab content
Use fullwidthIcon for dashboard-style navigation (icon prominence)
Use outerIcon for step-by-step processes (visual progress indicators)
Color contrast: Ensure titleColor vs tabbgType has 4.5:1 minimum (WCAG AA)
Active state: Use distinct titleActcolor/tabHbgType so users know active tab
Mobile: Set hideToggle to convert tabs to accordion on xs/sm breakpoints
Tab padding: 12-20px vertical, 20-40px horizontal for comfortable targets
Border radius: 5-10px for modern rounded tabs
Test all tabs have similar content heights - very different heights hurt UX
For vertical tabs: align content with top of navigation (VerticalAlign: 'top')
Use navAlign: 'text-left' for vertical tabs, 'text-center' for horizontal

layoutContext.parentBlocks: Can be used in any container (tp-container, tp-row/tp-column, tp-container-inner)
layoutContext.childBlocks: None - uses tablistRepeater array for tab content OR tp-tab-item child blocks
layoutContext.siblingBlocks: Often paired with tp-heading above for section titles
layoutContext.horizontalLayout: Navigation at top/bottom, content fills width. navPosition: 'top'/'bottom'.
layoutContext.verticalLayout: Navigation sidebar left/right (vernavWidth), content fills remaining width. navPosition: 'left'/'right'.
layoutContext.mobileAccordion: When hideToggle enabled on breakpoint, tabs transform to accordion (collapsible panels).
layoutContext.swiperBehavior: When swiperEffect: true, content slides horizontally with swipe gesture support.
layoutContext.fullwidthIconLayout: When fullwidthIcon: true, icon displays above title (vertical stack) instead of beside.
layoutContext.responsiveStrategy: Use hideToggle to convert tabs â†’ accordion on mobile. Set vernavWidth responsive values.

performanceConsiderations: Large tablistRepeater (20+ tabs) can slow initial render - paginate or filter
swiperEffect loads Swiper.js library (~50KB) - use only when needed
FontAwesome icons load from font - ensure font loaded before tabs render
Very different content heights per tab can cause layout thrashing
Mobile accordion mode (hideToggle) creates duplicate DOM elements - test performance
Template content (contentType: 'template') loads reusable blocks - can be heavy
accessibilityNotes: Tab navigation should use ARIA roles: role='tablist', role='tab', role='tabpanel'
Tab panels should have aria-labelledby pointing to tab ID
Keyboard navigation: Arrow keys to navigate tabs, Tab to move between tab list and content
Color contrast: titleColor vs tabbgType must have 4.5:1 minimum (WCAG AA)
Hover-only activation (onhoverTab: 'hover') is not keyboard accessible
Icons are decorative - ensure tab titles are descriptive without relying on icons
Tab titles should clearly describe content (e.g., 'Account Settings' not 'Settings')
Mobile accordion mode maintains accessibility - proper heading levels
Focus indicators: Ensure visible focus state on tab navigation

relatedBlocks.tp-heading: Often paired above tabs for section titles
